column5: Had to laugh at this video, I'm sure the more mature sensible members will add their safety warnings but take a look. Sorry if this has been posted before
HAHA wow that is a  good one
Looks like those boys may have had a few wobbly pops... drunk as can be id say...lol
Either way, he'd be walkin' funny after that.
Either way, he'd be walkin' funny after that. Yep!  And if it was my auger, he'd be walking funny all the way back to shore....
best to be aware of where the muffler is, before mounting your steed! I wonder if Brian can make a seat for his cordless drill!? Thanks for the laugh! HH
LMAO  Ya Joe,it could be done. Just a larger disc to sit on..LOL
LMAO  Ya Joe,it could be done. Just a larger disc to sit on..LOL Been done:     Hands up those who had one?  "Here"
Oh.. I can see this being a new contest at Bernie's... one guy on each handle and a coin flip to see who gets the throttle side!
Guess I'll have to find a turbocharger and some high performance exhaust for Joe's auger.Brian should be able to rig up a stronger handle.Let the game's begin....
Save the power auger. Just fuel-up the boys with lemon drops and put them on a sit-in-spinâ€¦ Then post video here.

Guess I'll have to find a turbocharger and some high performance exhaust for Joe's auger. Brian should be able to rig up a stronger handle. Let the game's begin....  As long as we use your drill Bernie. Let the games begin. Joes first.

I'm in! Just gotta show me where the finish line is! Lemon drops will have to be afterwards... don't want to spill any! But it would look pretty funny spinning around with a lemon wedge stuck in my teeth! HH
